Our Authors

Explore the expertise, insights, and passions of the authors who contribute to Green Orbit Digital’s knowledge base.

Unnamed

View Profile

About Our Authors

Our authors are experts in sustainable marketing, space industry communications, and digital strategy. Each author brings unique insights, practical experience, and a passion for driving measurable impact while supporting responsible growth in the space sector.

Our Approach

  • Sharing actionable knowledge and expertise in sustainable marketing for space-focused organisations
  • Fostering transparency and trust through clear, data-driven insights
  • Promoting innovation and creativity in content strategy and storytelling
  • Collaborating with clients and peers to drive responsible growth
  • Encouraging continuous learning and thought leadership in the space community

Ready to collaborate?

Let’s drive responsible growth for your organisation. Get in touch for a custom package or exploratory call.

Contact Us
Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
